enhanced_by.reason: The toString method relies on the state set by the constructor, which initializes sqlType, javaType, and value.
The toString method includes the value field, which can be modified by the setValue method.
The register method modifies the state of the CallableStatement, which indirectly affects the toString method by potentially changing the value field.
The setValue method directly modifies the value field, which is included in the toString method's output.
